Add option to select Lato Font Family.

Adds the option to select Google's Lato Font family in QKSMS.
Changes RobotoTextViewUtils and RobotoTypefaceManager to be generic.
Changes font family options to reflect actual family. IE:
Regular -> Roboto Regular.

This translation is complete for most languages. Languages vastly
different from english will need some small changes in this area.

Fix three cases of tabs being used instead of spaces.
fix send button not overlapping completely and not returning to original state after delayed send

Mark message as read in the MessageListFragment when it is attached, rather than when it started.

strip Đ and đ

Strip Đ and đ to D and d, respectively. With this change all characters used in Croatian alphabet are correctly stripped.
